x_snc_devtools_technical_debt.description: The test "DevTools - sys_metadata - Prevent useless checks" randomly fails when executed in the DevTools test suite via the GUI. However when executed separately, the test always passes.
x_snc_devtools_technical_debt.short_description: Test "DevTools - sys_metadata - Prevent useless checks" is flaky
x_snc_devtools_technical_debt.sys_name: Test "DevTools - sys_metadata - Prevent useless checks" is flaky
